section.title: Conventions
section.para: The OpenStack documentation uses several typesetting conventions.

note.para: The information in a note is usually in the form of a handy tip or reminder.

important.para: The information in an important notice is something you must be aware of before proceeding.

warning.para: The information in warnings is critical. Warnings provide additional information about risk of data loss or security issues.

simplesect.title: Command prompts
simplesect.para: Commands prefixed with the # prompt are to be executed by the root user. These examples can also be executed by using the sudo command, if available.
Commands prefixed with the $ prompt can be executed by any user, including root.
